activities.script: Walk to the frige. Open the door. Wait for 2-5 seconds. Close the door. Walk away
Walk to the frige. Open the door. Take an item out. Close the door. Walk away with the item.
Pick an item. Walk to the frige. Open the door. Put the item in the refrigerator. Close the door. Walk away.
Walk to the frige. Tap the screen on the right. Interact with it for 5 seconds (e.g., browse recipe, watch video, say hey bixby <some command>). Walk away.
Walk to the frige. Do nothing for 5 seconds. Walk away.
